Subject: War Machines

From: KSLawdogg@...

Chaos/Minion:



Chaos slowly got up, kicking an unconscious Minion in the side of the head.
"Get up!  We've got to get out of here before the blasted ship explodes."

Minion slowly got up, sighing loudly.  "Listen you idiot, shut up!  My 
neurological circuitry is throbbing!" 

The two jumped through a hole in the ship, landing in sand.  Both waved to 
Repressor, Havoc, and Demolition. "Over here!" they yelled in unison.
